title: Nenggiri polls: Voters' opportunity to seek change for better state leadership — Bung Moktar
summary: Voters in the Nenggiri state constituency need to take the opportunity of the by-election there to send a clear signal to the PAS-led Kelantan government that they want a change towards better leadership, said Umno Supreme Council member Datuk Seri Bung Moktar Radin.
content:
GUA MUSANG (Aug 7): Voters in the Nenggiri state constituency need to take the opportunity of the by-election there to send a clear signal to the PAS-led Kelantan government that they want a change towards better leadership, said Umno Supreme Council member Datuk Seri Bung Moktar Radin.

He said that he is also confident that if the by-election result favours Barisan Nasional candidate Mohd Azmawi Fikri Abdul Ghani, it will also be able to change the state's political polemic as a whole.
